Text: ZOMG the island was Purgatory and they were dead all along. I knew Abed was the smoke monster! Hot. Hot hot hot.
Save Community! Lets force NBC to reverse its decision to 'bench' Community: http://www.save-community.com/

DVD sales and fan support are the few things keeping the show on the air. Idiot shows like Big Bang Theory have already forced Community to almost-cancellation last December, and it's going to happen soon. Please, if you love the show as much as I do, consider buying the DVD!
